interface.description: Represents a display that can show display video streams. If the node also implements a `urn:nfi:iot:hi:media:loudSpeakers:*` interface, the node can play both video and audio streams.

field.name: URL
field.description: URL of the stream currently being played.

field.name: Width
field.description: Width in pixels of the video.

field.name: Height
field.description: Height in pixels of the video.

field.name: Rate
field.description: Current playback rate. 1 = Normal playback. 2 = Twice the speed of normal playback. 0.5 = Half the speed of normal playback, etc.

field.name: Volume
field.description: Current volume, in percent. 0% = Volume off, 100% = Maximum volume.

field.name: Mute
field.description: If volume is muted or not.

parameter.name: Play
parameter.description: If true, starts playback of current stream. If false, stops playback.

parameter.name: Rate
parameter.description: Desired playback rate. The display can choose the play back rate closest to the desired value.

parameter.name: Mute
parameter.description: If volume should be muted or not.

parameter.name: Position
parameter.description: Move the current position to a given timestamp within the current stream.

parametrizedCommand.name: Load
parametrizedCommand.description: Loads a new stream. Playback starts automatically.

parameter.name: URL
parameter.description: URL of new stream to play
